description: Manual SPEC_HINT catalog - Fallback for rules NOT auto-generated from HL7 StructureDefinitions. Advisory only, not enforced.
_comment: REFACTORED 2025-12-15: Removed all hints that are auto-generated from HL7 R4 StructureDefinitions (min>0 rules). Only implementation guidance and best practices remain.
_removed_categories: Simple required fields with min=1 in HL7 StructureDefinitions (now auto-generated)
Examples removed: Encounter.status, Encounter.class, Observation.status, Observation.code

Organization.reason: Implementation best practice: Organization should have a name for usability, though HL7 FHIR R4 does not mandate it (min=0)
Organization.rationale: HL7 R4 StructureDefinition has Organization.name with min=0, but a name is essential for practical use

Location.reason: Implementation best practice: Location should have a name for identification, though HL7 FHIR R4 does not mandate it (min=0)
Location.rationale: HL7 R4 StructureDefinition has Location.name with min=0, but a name is essential for practical use
